title: Cloud adaptation
extract: Elasticity (cloud computing) ... In cloud computing, elasticity is defined as "the degree to which a system is able to adapt to workload changes by provisioning and de-provisioning resources in an autonomic manner, such that at each point in time the available resources match the current demand as closely as possible".
extract_html: Elasticity (cloud computing) ...
